tool_description: climate change news api from different webistes
name: climate-api
title: climate-api

api_list.name: get individual news source
api_list.description: get individual news source from different resources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-api1.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-api1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
